Name: Monster Hunter XX Damage Calculator

Name: Monster Hunter Wilds Damage Calculator
Description: This is an app that is currently in development for the upcoming game 'Monster Hunter Wilds'. It will serve the same purpose as the first one I made but will be available on both Android and web browsers due to it being developed with Flutter framework instead of Java [ADD MORE]

Name: Digimon TCG Deckbuilder
Description: This was an app I made for players at my local card shop to help keep track of their decks instead of having to keep everything written down on paper. The card information was *NOT* gathered manually, this was gathered using a webscrapper made in Python.
